message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a lower price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $85?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking of a price a bit higher than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $92?
Hi Alice, I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $88?
Hi Bob, I understand you're still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be willing to meet me at $91?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $89?
Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a bit more flexibility. I'm willing to make one more concession. Would you be willing to meet me at $90?
